title: Determine If You Like Cats
text: goal pets provide simple means people express feelings pets. present, package contains one function: cats().

title: Determine If You Like Cats
text: can install development version pets GitHub :

title: Determine If You Like Cats
text: basic example shows solve common problem:
code: # Here are two simple examples that allow you to express your feelings about cats.  library(pets)  ## if you like cats cats(TRUE) #> [1] "I love cats"  ## if you don't like cats cats(FALSE) #> [1] "I am not a cat person."

title: Expresses feelings about cats — cats
text: love logical argument indicating love cats. Either TRUE FALSE

title: Expresses feelings about cats — cats
text: returns one two possible character strings describing feelings cats
